title: Leezen - Gongguan
description: Part of a vegetarian health food chain with many locations throughout Taiwan; this one is near 2 veggie restaurants (So Free Pizza & Kai Xing Nong Tsung). Founded by a Buddhist organization with emphasis on organic, natural, and vegetarian. Most items are vegan, some with dairy. Stocks a range of dried foods and snacks as well chilled foods, natural and organic clothing and cleaning products.
streetAddress: 24, Lane 283, Sec. 3, Luosifu Road, Daan District
